content.text: CSS Grid Item
Try it Yourself »
content.html: Try it Yourself »

content.text: Grid Items
A grid container contains one or more grid items .
content.html: A grid container contains one or more grid items.

content.text: By default, a container has one grid item for each column, in each row, but you can style the grid items so that they will span multiple columns and/or rows.
content.html: By default, a container has one grid item for each column, in each row, but you can style the grid items so that they will span multiple columns and/or rows.

content.text: The grid-column-start and grid-column-end Properties
The grid-column-start property specifies where to start a grid item.
content.html: The grid-column-start property specifies where to start a grid item.

content.text: The grid-column-end property specifies where to end a grid item.
content.html: The grid-column-end property specifies where to end a grid item.

content.code_html:
.item1 {
  grid-column-start: 1;
  grid-column-end: 3;
}

content.text: The grid-column Property
The grid-column property is a shorthand property for the grid-column-start and the grid-column-end properties.
content.html: The grid-column property is a shorthand property for the grid-column-start and the grid-column-end properties.

content.text: To place an item, you can refer to line numbers , or use the keyword "span" to define how many columns the item will span.
content.html: To place an item, you can refer to line numbers, or use the keyword "span" to define how many columns the item will span.

content.code_html:
.item1 {
  grid-column: 1 / span 2;
}

.item1 {
  grid-column: 1 / 4;
}

.item2 {
  grid-column: 2 / span 2;
}

content.text: The grid-row-start and grid-row-end Property
The grid-row-start property specifies where to start a grid item.
content.html: The grid-row-start property specifies where to start a grid item.

content.text: The grid-row-end property specifies where to end a grid item.
content.html: The grid-row-end property specifies where to end a grid item.

content.code_html:
.item1 {
  grid-row-start: 1;
  grid-row-end: 3;
}

content.text: The grid-row Property
The grid-row property is a shorthand property for the grid-row-start and the grid-row-end properties.
content.html: The grid-row property is a shorthand property for the grid-row-start and the grid-row-end properties.

content.text: To place an item, you can refer to line numbers , or use the keyword "span" to define how many rows the item will span:
content.html: To place an item, you can refer to line numbers, or use the keyword "span" to define how many rows the item will span:

content.code_html:
.item1 {
  grid-row: 1 / span 2;
}

.item1 {
  grid-row: 1 / 4;
}

content.text: The grid-area Property
The grid-area property is a shorthand property for the grid-row-start , grid-column-start , grid-row-end and the grid-column-end properties.
content.html: The grid-area property is a shorthand property for the grid-row-start, grid-column-start, grid-row-end and the grid-column-end properties.

content.text: The syntax is grid-row-start / grid-column-start / grid-row-end / grid-column-end.
content.html: The syntax is grid-row-start / grid-column-start / grid-row-end / grid-column-end.

content.code_html:
.item4 {
  grid-area: 1 / 2 / 3 / 2;
}

.item8 {
  grid-area: 1 / 1 / span 4 / span 1;
}

content.text: Naming Grid Items with grid-area
The grid-area property can also be used to assign names to grid items.
content.html: The grid-area property can also be used to assign names to grid items.

content.text: The named grid items can then be referred to by the grid-template-areas property of the grid container.
content.html: The named grid items can then be referred to by the grid-template-areas property of the grid container.

content.code_html:
.item1 {
  grid-area: myArea;
}

.grid-container {
  grid-template-areas: 'myArea myArea myArea myArea myArea';
}

content.text: Each row is defined by apostrophes (' ').
content.html: Each row is defined by apostrophes (' ').

content.text: The named grid items in each row is defined inside the apostrophes, separated by a space.
content.html: The named grid items in each row is defined inside the apostrophes, separated by a space.

content.code_html:
.item1 {
  grid-area: myArea;
}

.grid-container {
  grid-template-areas: 'myArea myArea myArea . .';
}

content.text: Note: A period sign represents a grid item with no name.
content.html: Note: A period sign represents a grid item with no name.

content.text: To define two rows, define the second row inside another set of apostrophes:
content.html: To define two rows, define the second row inside another set of apostrophes:

content.code_html:
.item1 {
  grid-area: myArea;
}

.grid-container {
  grid-template-areas:
    'myArea myArea . . .'
    'myArea myArea . . .';
}

syntaxHighlighting.text:
grid-template-areas:    
  'header header header header header header'    'menu main 
  main main main right'    'menu footer footer footer footer 
  footer';

:    
  'header header header header header header'    'menu main 
  main main main right'    'menu footer footer footer footer 
  footer';

syntax_highlighting.text:
grid-template-areas:    
  'header header header header header header'    'menu main 
  main main main right'    'menu footer footer footer footer 
  footer';

:    
  'header header header header header header'    'menu main 
  main main main right'    'menu footer footer footer footer 
  footer';

content.code_html:
.item1 { grid-area: header; }
.item2 { grid-area: menu; }
.item3 { grid-area: main; }
.item4 { grid-area: right; }
.item5 { grid-area: footer; }

.grid-container {
  grid-template-areas:
    'header header header header header header'
    'menu main main main main right'
    'menu footer footer footer footer footer';
}

syntax_highlighting_data.text:
grid-template-areas:    
  'header header header header header header'    'menu main 
  main main main right'    'menu footer footer footer footer 
  footer';

:    
  'header header header header header header'    'menu main 
  main main main right'    'menu footer footer footer footer 
  footer';

content.text: The Order of the Grid Items
The grid-area property can also be used to define the order of the grid items.
content.html: The grid-area property can also be used to define the order of the grid items.

content.text: The first grid item in the HTML code does not have to appear as the first item in the grid.
content.html: The first grid item in the HTML code does not have to appear as the first item in the grid.

content.code_html:
/* place in row 1 column 3 */
.item1 {grid-area: 1 / 3;}

/* place in row 2 column 3 */
.item2 {grid-area: 2 / 3;}

/* place in row 1 column 1 */
.item3 {grid-area: 1 / 1;}

/* place in row 1 column 2 */
.item4 {grid-area: 1 / 2;}

/* place in row 2 column 1 */
.item5 {grid-area: 2 / 1;}

/* place in row 2 column 2 */
.item6 {grid-area: 2 / 2;}

content.text: You can also re-arrange the order for certain screen sizes, with media queries:
content.html: You can also re-arrange the order for certain screen sizes, with media queries:

content.code_html:
@media only screen and (max-width: 500px) {
  .item1 {grid-area: 1 / span 3;}
  .item2 {grid-area: 3 / 3;}
  .item3 {grid-area: 2 / 1;}
  .item4 {grid-area: 2 / 2 / span 2;}
  .item5 {grid-area: 3 / 1;}
  .item6 {grid-area: 2 / 3;}
}

content.text: The justify-self Property
The justify-self property is used to align the content of a grid item along the row axis.
content.html: The justify-self property is used to align the content of a grid item along the row axis.

content.code_html:
.item1 {
  justify-self: right;
}

.item6 {
  justify-self: center;
}

content.text: The align-self Property
The align-self property is used to align the content of a grid item along the column axis.
content.html: The align-self property is used to align the content of a grid item along the column axis.

content.code_html:
.item1 {
  align-self: start;
}

.item6 {
  align-self: center;
}

content.text: All CSS Grid Item Properties

content.code_html:
Property Description
align-self Aligns the content for a specific grid item along the column axis
grid-area A shorthand property for the grid-row-start, grid-column-start, grid-row-end and the grid-column-end properties
grid-column A shorthand property for the grid-column-start and the grid-column-end properties
grid-column-end Specifies where to end the grid item
grid-column-start Specifies where to start the grid item
grid-row A shorthand property for the grid-row-start and the grid-row-end properties
grid-row-end Specifies where to end the grid item
grid-row-start Specifies where to start the grid item
justify-self Aligns the content for a specific grid item along the row axis
place-self A shorthand property for the align-self and the justify-self properties
